imdb.plot outline: This show (which I appeared in) was a weekly look back at classic television that has since been wiped from the u.k archives. Each Saturday night for 12 weeks the programme was broadcast on Birmingham's local tv channel big centre TV and regularly featured guests such as William Gallagher, Gary Jordan and Ray langstone discussing missing tv and the lengths that the organisation kaleidoscope go to to retrieving it. Among topics discussed (which changed by the week) were missing cop shows, pop shows (especially totp) and children's tv to name but a few. It was repeated on Tuesday evenings at 10pm but hasn't been shown since.
imdb.title: The Long Lost Shows Show
akas: The Long Lost Shows Show (United Kingdom)
plot: Looking at TV that's missing from the archives.::Richard clarke

This show (which I appeared in) was a weekly look back at classic television that has since been wiped from the u.k archives. Each Saturday night for 12 weeks the programme was broadcast on Birmingham's local tv channel big centre TV and regularly featured guests such as William Gallagher, Gary Jordan and Ray langstone discussing missing tv and the lengths that the organisation kaleidoscope go to to retrieving it. Among topics discussed (which changed by the week) were missing cop shows, pop shows (especially totp) and children's tv to name but a few. It was repeated on Tuesday evenings at 10pm but hasn't been shown since.::richard clarke
